Reference

All functions

axis_labs() axis_col_labs() axis_label() axis_asis()

Generate axis labels or col/label structures for plots

c(<yspec>)

Add extra column elements to a yspec object

fda_content_table()

Print a table of contents for FDA define document

fda_define()

Generate content for FDA define document

fda_table() fda_table_file()

Generate a table for FDA define.pdf document

get_meta()

Get meta data from a specification object

load_spec_any()

Load a specification file, guessing the type

load_spec_ex() load_proj_ex() file_spec_ex() file_proj_ex()

Generate an example specification object

md_outline()

Generate an outline representation of a data spec

mrgtemplate()

Create build location for branded documents

pander_table() pander_table_df()

Render a spec as a pandoc table

primary_keys()

Get the primary keys from a specification object

render_define() render_spec()

Render a define.pdf document

render_fda_define()

Render a define.pdf document conforming to FDA standards

x_table() x_table_long()

Format specification output with xtable

ys_check() ys_check_file() check_data() check_data_file()

Check a data set against its specification

ys_document()

Render a document from one or more specification objects

ys_get_lookup()

Generate lookup list

print(<yhelp>) ys_help

yspec help object

ys_load() ys_load_file() load_spec()

Load a data specification file

ys_load_meta()

Load SETUP__ block from a file

ys_load_proj() load_spec_proj()

Load a project-wide spec file

ys_lookup_source()

Get column lookup source

ys_project() ys_project_file() as_proj_spec()

Create a project object from data spec objects

ys_sanitize() ys_dont_sanitize() ys_mild_sanitize()

Functions to sanitize text for TeX documents

ys_spec_file()

Get the file name for a yspec object

yspec

yspec: data specification documents from yaml

yspec_add_factors() yspec_make_factor()

Add factors to data set based on spec information

yspec_select_chr()

Select all columns that are character

yspec_select_discrete()

Select all columns that are discrete

yspec_yml_file()

Get the yaml file location for a spec object
